group_1.narration: The final moments of these Magical Girls,@and the hope they entrusted to me.
The memories of those involved are inscribed here,@along with their thoughts and emotions.
That's why I think this inherited hope deserves@more than what someone like me can provide.
It's time for everyone in Promised Blood@to banish the shadow covering the world.

group_1.textCenter: The world is a big place, Gunhild.
Because you made my dreams come true,@I got to see so many different places...
That's why, even when I couldn't go any further,@I wanted to see as much as I could.
We should find a nice place to settle down,@and spend our days quietly.
I have plenty of stories to tell you of my travels,@Gunhild. Just wait and see.
It's almost time for me to go to Valhalla.
I can't wait to sit around the fire with you@and chat about the old days.
But before I go, I'm going to entrust my hopes@to the future.
Because being a Magical Girl is tough, and I want@to leave a legacy for those yet to come.
I can do for them what you did for me, Gunhild.
Maybe we can show those Magical Girls@just how vast the world is.
